alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 9:29PM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 12 inches with 12 to 18 inches expected in the eastern Catskills. Winds gusting as high as 30 to 40 mph in the higher terrain areas. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern Connecticut, western Massachusetts and mid Hudson Valley and eastern Catskills. * WHEN...Through 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult tonight due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to one inch per hour at times tonight. Snowfall rates up to 2 inches per hour at times are possible in the eastern Catskills.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
